descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kevin Love credits the Cavaliers' defensive plan for a Game 1 victory over the Raptors while grading the two phenomenal dunks from LeBron James and Iman Shumpert.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Interview (Love gives LeBron's dunk the edge over Shumpert's) 2017/05/01

videos.headline: Love gives LeBron's dunk the edge over Shumpert's
